API Reference#

Profile#

create_profile(method: str, start=None, stop=None, num=100, shp_num_points: Optional[int] = None, shapefile: Optional[str] = None)[source]#

Create a pandas DataFrame of points along a line with multiple methods.

Parameters

  • method (str) ‚Äì Choose sampling method, either ‚Äúpoints‚Äù or ‚Äúshapefile‚Äù

  • start (array, optional) ‚Äì Coordinates for starting point of profile, by default None

  • stop (array, optional) ‚Äì Coordinates for eding point of profile, by default None

  • num (int, optional) ‚Äì Number of points between start and stop, by default 100

  • shp_num_points (int, optional) ‚Äì Number of points to resample shapefile to, by default None

  • shapefile (str, optional) ‚Äì shapefile file name to create points along, by default None

Returns

Dataframe with ‚Äòx‚Äô, ‚Äòy‚Äô, and ‚Äòdist‚Äô columns for points along line or shapefile path.

Return type

pd.Dataframe
